steps.name: New User Setup: Free User Sign up
Create new user data
Free user sign up API call
New User Setup: Free User Email Confirmation via Database
New User Setup: Free User Login
Fill in "Email Address" input field
Fill in "Password" input field
Click on "Login" button
New User Setup: Upgrade Free User to Business
Click on "Settings" item on the left SideMenu
Click on "Billing" item in the Settings submenu
Click on "Upgrade" button for Business option
Enter card details
Enter card number
Enter expiration date
Enter CVC
Enter Full Name
Enter ZIP
Click on "Subscribe" button
Click on "No,thanks" button
The toast message with the text "Plan has been successfully changed." is visible and then hidden
Click on "Sign" item on the left SideMenu
Precondition: Add team member with "Admin" role set
Click on "Team" item on the left SideMenu
Click on "Add Team Member" button
Fill in the  team member's 'Email' input field
Fill in the  team member's 'Name' input field
Get the team member's role value
Change team member role to Admin
Open team member role dropdown
Select the team member's role from the dropdown
Click on "Send Invites" button
Retrieve the confirmation link from the user's email.
Navigate to the invite link
Click on "Back to main page" button
The toast message with the text "Invite accepted." is visible and then hidden
Click on "Team" item on the left SideMenu
Verify the team member has role 'Admin' set in the Team table
